message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something closer to my original price. Would you consider $11,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $10,500 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our values.
